Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 6 displays the ln(JL 3 / V 2 ) vs ( V / L ) 0.5 curve for the measurement of the hole mobility of the blend films of PzNDTDTBT / PC71BM ( 1 : 2 , w / w ) and PzNDTDTBO / PC71BM ( 1.5 : 1 , w / w ) by the SCLC method.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PC71BM |
| PzNDTDTBO |

The paragraph mentions three materials: PzNDTDTBT, PC71BM, and PzNDTDTBO. These are the valid entities for the "Material Name" category.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph again, I confirm that the previous table contains the only valid entities that can be categorized as "Material Name". Here is the table again for reference:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PC71BM |
| PzNDTDTBO |

These three entities are the only ones that can be classified as material names, as they refer to specific chemical compounds used in the measurement of the hole mobility of blend films.
